content.text: Hi! I'm trying to cope with my breakup. I'm not sure what to do.
Oh no, that's so tough. I'm here for you if you need to talk.
Well, my boyfriend of 5 years broke up with me a few weeks ago. We were living together and everything.
Oh, that's really rough. I'm so sorry.
Yeah, it's been tough. I'm not sure what to do.
Well, it's okay to feel lost. Breakups are hard. It's going to take some time to heal.
I know. I just feel like I don't know who I am anymore.
That's normal. You've been through a lot. Give yourself some time.
I know. But you're going to be okay. Just keep moving forward.
No problem. I'm here for you.
